Notes

Red vinyl in standard jacket with 12" x 12" lyric insert and poster. Includes a download code. First catalog number on spine. Second catalog number on labels. Captured on two-inch tape at World Famous Studios Denver, Colorado | January 2016. © Blood Incantation 2016 ℗ Dark Descent Records 2016
